string-array.name: quotes
string-array.item: "Keep calm and keep kaam se kaam"
"I hope one day I love someone the way women in commercials love yogurt."
"I believe in Karma that means I will do all bad things to people all day and assume these were their Karma."
"The longer I wait, the hotter I date."
"If I agreed with you then we'd both be wrong."
"My crush is like a username, already taken."
"Me and my wife lived happily for 25 years, and then we met."
"I smoke for religious reasons. Every puff gets me five minutes closer to God."
"I'm so tall, when it rains I'm always the first one to know."
"Sarcasm is the cleavage of personality."
"I can totally keep secrets. It's the people I tell them to who can't."
"Who cares if schools don’t teach us how to raise family…how to find my spouse…or how to get a job? At least I can find the area of a triangle."
"She said, "Describe me in one word." Can't. And my favourite one."
" I keep on dreaming high but gravity pulls me down."
"The only way to do great work is to love what you do."
"Believe you can and you’re halfway there."
"Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts."
"You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream."
"The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall."
"Love is the master key that opens the gates of happiness."
"You are the finest, loveliest, tenderest, and most beautiful person I have ever known, and even that is an understatement."
"The greatest happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved; loved for ourselves, or rather, loved in spite of ourselves."
"The best is yet to come."
"Love recognizes no barriers. It jumps hurdles, leaps fences, penetrates walls to arrive at its destination full of hope"
"My biggest concern in life is actually how my online friends can be informed of my death."
"My love doesn’t sleep; it keeps on looking for you with its eyes open."
"I was going to take over the world this morning, but I overslept."
"My therapist says I have a preoccupation with vengeance. We’ll see about that."

resources.string: Please click the \"Display Quote\" button to show the quotes!!!
No more quotes left. thank you!!!
